dcterms:creator: P. Arora
dcterms:description: The TREC question dataset involves classifying a question sentence into six types. The dataset has predefined train-test split with 5452 training samples and 500 testing samples.
dcterms:title: TREC question dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Kim
dcterms:description: The Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST-1) contains one sentence movie reviews rated on a scale of 1-5 from positive to negative. It has a predefined train-test-dev split with 8544 training samples, 2210 testing samples, and 1101 validation samples.
dcterms:title: Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST-1)

dcterms:creator: Y. Kim
dcterms:description: The Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST-2) is a binary version of SST-1 with only two labels: positive and negative. It has 6920 training samples, 1821 testing samples, and 872 validation samples.
dcterms:title: Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST-2)

dcterms:creator: A. Conneau
G. Lample
R. Rinott
A. Williams
S. R. Bowman
H. Schwenk
V. Stoyanov
dcterms:description: XNLI is a multilingual dataset used for evaluating cross-lingual sentence representations, particularly for natural language inference tasks.
dcterms:title: XNLI
